location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH MAP TO SHEW APPROXIMATELY RAILWAYS IN ASIATIC TURKEY'

physicalDescription.extent: Material: printed on paper.Dimensions: 230 x 340mm, on sheet 320 x 450mm.

mods.abstract: Map, illustrating railway lines in Asiatic Turkey, to accompany Bagdad Railway No. 1 (1911). Presented to both Houses of Parliament by Command of His Majesty, May 1911(London, His Majesty's Stationery Office). The publication appears on folios 215-252.The map was produced by the Topographical Section of the General Staff, War Office.
